description.english: Catch 25 people in the parade with one move!
description.german: Erwische 25 Leute in der Parade mit einem Move!
description.french: Attirez 25 personnes dans votre défilé avec une seule action !
description.italian: Attira nel corteo 25 persone in una mossa sola!
description.spanish: Atrae a 25 personas en el desfile con un solo movimiento.
description.brazilian: Atraia 25 pessoas na parada com um movimento!

description.english: Fill the tail of the parade with 150 people
description.german: Fülle das Ende der Parade mit 150 Leuten
description.french: Remplissez la queue du défilé avec 150 personnes
description.italian: Riempi la coda del corteo di 150 persone
description.spanish: Consigue que la cola del desfile tenga 150 personas.
description.brazilian: Encha a traseira da parada com 150 pessoas

description.english: Fill the tail of the parade with 300 people
description.german: Fülle das Ende der Parade mit 300 Leuten
description.french: Remplissez la queue du défilé avec 300 personnes
description.italian: Riempi la coda del corteo di 300 persone
description.spanish: Consigue que la cola del desfile tenga 300 personas.
description.brazilian: Encha a traseira da parada com 300 pessoas

description.english: Fill the tail of the parade with 450 people
description.german: Fülle das Ende der Parade mit 450 Leuten
description.french: Remplissez la queue du défilé avec 450 personnes
description.italian: Riempi la coda del corteo di 450 persone
description.spanish: Consigue que la cola del desfile tenga 400 personas.
description.brazilian: Encha a traseira da parada com 450 pessoas

description.english: Fill the score rainbow at its maximum.
description.german: Fülle den Punkte-Regenbogen vollständig auf.
description.french: Remplissez au maximum l'arc-en-ciel des scores.
description.italian: Riempi al massimo l'arcobaleno del punteggio!
description.spanish: Rellena el arcoíris al máximo.
description.brazilian: Encha a pontuação arco-íris ao máximo.

description.english: Move the groups more than 150 times in a single match
description.german: Bewege die Gruppen mehr als 150 Mal in einem einzigen Match
description.french: Déplacez les groupes plus de 150 fois en une seule partie
description.italian: Muovi i gruppi più di 150 volte in una singola partita
description.spanish: Mueve a los grupos más de 150 veces en una partida.
description.brazilian: Mova os grupos mais de 150 vezes em uma partida

description.english: Do more than 100 abilities in a single Play Hard match
description.german: Führe mehr als 100 Fähigkeiten in einem einzigen "Play Hard"-Match aus
description.french: Effectuez plus de 100 actions dans une partie Play Hard
description.italian: Attiva più di 100 abilità in una singola partita Play Hard
description.spanish: Ejecuta más de 100 habilidades en una sola partida de Play Hard.
description.brazilian: Use mais de 100 habilidades em uma partida no modo difícil

description.english: Complete a Vanilla Sequence with only Pride Hits
description.german: Schließe eine Vanille-Abfolge nur mit Pride-Treffern ab
description.french: Terminez une séquence Vanille uniquement avec des Coups Pride
description.italian: Completa una sequenza Vanilla eseguendo solo Colpi Pride
description.spanish: Completa una secuencia de Vainilla con aciertos Pride.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma sequência baunilha só com acertos orgulhosos

description.english: Complete a Vanilla Sequence without Miss Hits
description.german: Schließe eine Vanille-Abfolge ohne verpasste Treffer ab
description.french: Terminez une séquence Vanille sans aucun Coup manqué
description.italian: Completa una sequenza Vanilla senza eseguire Colpi Mancati
description.spanish: Completa una secuencia de Vainilla sin perder ni una sola vez.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma sequência baunilha sem errar

description.english: Complete a Vanilla match seeing a Special Event
description.german: Schließe eine Vanille-Abfolge mit einem besonderen Event ab
description.french: Terminez une partie Vanille en regardant un Événement spécial
description.italian: Completa un livello Vanilla assistendo a un Evento Speciale
description.spanish: Completa una partida de Vainilla viendo un evento especial.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma partida baunilha vendo um evento especial

description.english: Win a Dance Duel as quickly as possible
description.german: Gewinne ein Tanzduell so schnell wie möglich
description.french: Remportez un Dance Duel aussi vite que possible
description.italian: Vinci un Dance Duel in meno tempo possibile!
description.spanish: Gana un Dance Duel tan rápido como puedas.
description.brazilian: Ganhe um Dance Duel o mais rápido possível

description.english: Complete a Dance Duel without being hit
description.german: Schließe ein Tanzduell ab, ohne getroffen zu werden
description.french: Terminez un Dance Duel sans recevoir de coup
description.italian: Completa un Dance Duel senza mai subire un colpo
description.spanish: Completa un Dance Duel sin que te den ni una sola vez.
description.brazilian: Conclua um Dance Duel sem ser acertado

description.english: Win a Dance Duel without defending
description.german: Gewinne ein Tanzduell, ohne dich zu verteidigen
description.french: Remportez un Dance Duel sans vous défendre
description.italian: Vinci un Dance Duel senza mai difenderti
description.spanish: Gana un Dance Duel sin defenderte.
description.brazilian: Ganhe um Dance Duel sem se defender

description.english: Win a Dance Duel without attacking
description.german: Gewinne ein Tanzduell, ohne anzugreifen
description.french: Remportez un Dance Duel sans attaquer
description.italian: Vinci un Dance Duel senza mai attaccare
description.spanish: Gana un Dance Duel sin atacar.
description.brazilian: Ganhe um Dance Duel sem atacar

description.english: Defeat one Special Enemy
description.german: Besiege einen besonderen Feind
description.french: Battez un ennemi spécial
description.italian: Sconfiggi un Nemico Speciale
description.spanish: Derrota a un enemigo especial.
description.brazilian: Derrote um inimigo especial

description.english: Defeat all the Special Enemies
description.german: Besiege alle besonderen Feinde
description.french: Battez tous les ennemis spéciaux
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i Nemici Speciali
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los enemigos especiales.
description.brazilian: Derrote todos os inimigos especiais

description.english: Lose a Play Hard match
description.german: Verliere ein "Hard Play"-Match
description.french: Perdez une partie Play Hard
description.italian: Perdi una partita Play Hard
description.spanish: Pierde una partida de Play Hard.
description.brazilian: Perca uma partida no modo difícil

description.english: Unlock all groups
description.german: Schalte alle Gruppen frei
description.french: Débloquez tous les groupes
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i gruppi
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los grupos.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os grupos

description.english: Complete a Play Hard Level without using a Shield
description.german: Schließe einen "Hard Play"-Level ab, ohne einen Schild zu verwenden
description.french: Terminez un niveau Play Hard sans utiliser de bouclier
description.italian: Completa un livello Play Hard senza utilizzare mai uno Scudo
description.spanish: Completa un nivel de Play Hard sin utilizar ningún escudo.
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível no modo difícil sem usar escudos

description.english: Do 10 SuperRuns in one level
description.german: Mache 10 SuperLäufe in einem Level
description.french: Effectuez 10 Super Courses dans un même niveau
description.italian: Esegui 10 Super Corse in un solo livello
description.spanish: Haz 10 supermarchas en un nivel.
description.brazilian: Use 10 supercorridas em um nível

description.english: Collect 100 PowerUps
description.german: Sammle 100 PowerUps
description.french: Obtenez 100 power-ups
description.italian: Raccogli 100 Potenziamenti
description.spanish: Consigue 100 potenciadores.
description.brazilian: Colete 100 itens especiais

description.english: Complete all Dance Duels with a Prideality
description.german: Schließe alle Tanzduelle mit Prideality ab
description.french: Terminez tous les Dance Duel avec une Prideality
description.italian: Completa tutti i Dance Duel con una Prideality
description.spanish: Completa todos los Dance Duels con ¡Prideality!
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os Dance Duels sem uma Prideality

description.english: Listen to all the songs!
description.german: Höre dir alle Lieder an!
description.french: Écoutez toutes les chansons !
description.italian: Ascolta tutte le canzoni!
description.spanish: ¡Escucha a todas las canciones!
description.brazilian: Escute todas as músicas!
